casebody.data:
IN RE: SMITH 88A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 21, 2016 Elizabeth M. Haddix, Attorney at Law, Pittsboro, Mark Dorosin, Attorney at Law, Edwin A. Pressly, Attorney at Law, Statesville, for Smith, Carson, et al. Marc X. Sneed, Assistant Attorney General, Amar Majmundar, Special Deputy Attorney General, Elizabeth A. Fisher, Assistant Solicitor General, Olga Vysotskaya de Brito, *256Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of October 2016 by State of NC for Withdrawal and Substitution of Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of October 2016."
